1.text: Created attachment 123223 [details] Eclipse-project-export that demonstrates the error  As attachment you find a simple Eclipse-Project, which reproduces the error.

2.text: The project-structure consists of two packages "anttest" and "anttest.test".

3.text: The second package should not be included in the build, so I was trying to exclude it using a dirset.

4.text: This does not work, because with this configuration iajc always fails with an "already defined"-error for every type (class or aspect).

5.text: As comment I included a simple workaround for this problem in the iajc-task.

6.text: This workaround does its job, but I want to reuse the source-path-definition, which is not possible this way.
